short_summary: Biological and Technical Support Services: South Coast – Central West Coast Vancouver Island
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada’s Salmonid Enhancement Program (SEP) delivers the Community Involvement Program (CIP) with the intent of providing technical support to salmon enhancement projects and habitat enhancement/restoration projects undertaken by local community groups and volunteers.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Biological and Technical Support Services: South Coast – Central West Coast Vancouver Island

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01005952
**Solicitation Number:** 30003251
**Publication Date:** September 1, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 15, 2022, at 13:00:00

This RFx inviting contractors to submit a proposal for the delivery of biological and technical support services for the Salmonid Enhancement Program (SEP) in the Central West Coast Vancouver Island region.

**Background**
The SEP manages the delivery of the Community Involvement Program (CIP) and the Stream to Sea Program. These programs aim to promote cooperation and stewardship in fisheries and watershed management.

**Program Requirements**
The successful contractor will be responsible for providing biotechnical support and assistance to the upcoming CIP community groups, ensuring the projects' technical soundness. The contractor will also facilitate the delivery of the Stream to Sea Program within the Central West Coast Vancouver Island region.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Support the Community Advisor in delivering CIP projects
* Ensure technical soundness of CIP projects
* Deliver the Stream to Sea Program to promote cooperative fisheries and watershed stewardship activities

**Eligibility Requirements**

* bidder has the expertise and resources to deliver the expected projects and services
* bidder is able to adjust to changing requirements

**Documents and Submissions**

The full Request for Proposal (RFP) is available for download from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/01/2347b57c077b59025b28d68146980ea2/30003251_-_rfp_en.pdf) (English) and [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/01/775e5dffc360acf06255cde33141ba0f/30003251_-_rfp_fr.pdf) (French) websites.

**Contact**
Lavoie, Claire
Tenders
DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
(506) 282-2340

Note:
I repeated some information to ensure accuracy. 
All contact and payment information is removed from this document, as this is irrelevant to reading and sharing the government's tender announcement. 
Language was updated for readability and to replace ambiguous statements with clear definitions.
